author: cnbc.com
title: KCSA Strategic Communications Relocates Headquarters To 420 Fifth Avenue
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- KCSA Strategic Communications today announced that it has relocated its corporate headquarters to 420 Fifth Avenue, Third Floor, New York, NY, 10018.
Todd Fromer, President & Managing Partner of KCSA Strategic Communications, said, "Midtown Manhattan has been our home for almost 50 years. This move to one of the finest, Class A buildings in Bryant Park continues this tradition while giving our growing family of professionals a more central location and a refreshing, new work environment."
About KCSA Strategic Communications
KCSA Strategic Communications is a fully-integrated communications agency specializing in public relations, investor relations, social media and marketing with expertise in financial and professional services, technology, healthcare, media and energy companies. Since 1969, the firm has demonstrated strategic thinking and program execution that drives results for its clients in the ever-changing communications and digital landscape. The firm's clients are its best references.
